name: INBookRestaurantReservationIntent
desc: A request to create a reservation at the specified restaurant.

items.name: init(restaurant: INRestaurant, booking: DateComponents, partySize: Int, bookingIdentifier: String?, guest: INRestaurantGuest?, selectedOffer: INRestaurantOffer?, guestProvidedSpecialRequestText: String?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified booking information.

items.name: var restaurant: INRestaurant
items.desc: The restaurant to contact regarding the booking.

items.name: var bookingDateComponents: DateComponents
items.desc: The date and time of the reservation.

items.name: var bookingIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier associated with the initial reservation data.

items.name: var partySize: Int
items.desc: The total number of people in the userâ€™s party.

items.name: var guest: INRestaurantGuest?
items.desc: The identity of the guest associated with the reservation.

items.name: var guestProvidedSpecialRequestText: String?
items.desc: Information about any special requests made by the user.

items.name: var selectedOffer: INRestaurantOffer?
items.desc: The special offer, if any, selected by the user.
